message: The colors, watercolors, plasticine, origami, collage. They reveal what are the most genuine dreams of the children that go through a forced displacement situation because of violence.

photos.title: Gardens full of life
photos.description: “My sisters and I love to play, that's why I would love to have a big garden to play tag”.
photos.author: Juan, 13 years old

photos.title: Watercolor for the future
photos.description: “I am nervous, I wonder how our house will be like. I could paint it just like this one; I am going to miss it”.
photos.author: Jorge, 14 years old

photos.title: Pink home
photos.description: “I would like to move into a pink house with lots of space, with a big backyard, so we can be all together”
photos.author: Yesica, 15 years old

photos.title: Green as hope
photos.description: “I searched through the Internet, and this is the house that I liked the most, green is my favorite color”
photos.author: José, 16 years old

photos.title: A home with colors
photos.description: “A house with my mom, my dad, a bright sun and places to play”.
photos.author: Karla, 9 years old

photos.title: The dream about a purple house
photos.description: “Once I dreamt about these big fields, with green mountains and, at the end, a purple house. That sure was my little house, purple, as in a fairy tale”.
photos.author: Margarita, 11 years old

photos.title: My house and life in a scrapbook
photos.description: “We have moved from home to home so many times, that every portion of the paper is one of them. We don’t have one, but I’m looking forward to; to paint it. I will remember all of them”.
photos.author: Marina, 16 years old

photos.title: A house with a pool
photos.description: “I want our house to be big, with a pool to be able to play with my sister, and to have lots of space”.
photos.author: Fernando, 9 years old

photos.title: Bright sun, blue sky
photos.description: “I dream about arriving to a place like the one I used to play at when I was a little child. With a bright sun and a blue sky, so blue. And a house big enough for all of us”.
photos.author: Marcos, 14 years old

photos.title: A house to go
photos.description: “I would like to take my house with me. I don’t know where we will go, but I wish I did not have to leave it; I wish I could take it with me”.
photos.author: Antonio, 7 years old
